name: Unrooted[GGJ2023]
description:
A slightly late entry for the Global Game Jam. 
Mostly just experimenting with some procedural generation and animation, not much of a game yet, just a little scene to move around in. 

May be a little graphicly intensive, I am using few million particles to draw everything, so things might get a little slow on an older GPU.

I did try a mac build, but am not sure if it actually works. If anyone wants to try that out and let me know that would be great!

WASD to move around.

Space to turn on the wind.

Tab to reset the scene

Esc to quit.

Gamepads should work too but I have not tested.
